q: The more reasons you have for achieving your goal, the more determined you will become.
h:
“The more reasons you have for achieving your goal, the more determined you will become.” —
Brian Tracy

q: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
h:
“There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.” —
Beverly Sills

q: When you are totally at peace with yourself, nothing can shake you.
h:
“When you are totally at peace with yourself, nothing can shake you.” —
Deepam Chaterjee

q: The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.
h:
“The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.” —
Sigmund Freud

q: I do not seek. I find.
h:
“I do not seek. I find.” —
Pablo Picasso

q: Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment.
h:
“Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment.” —
Celestine Chua

q: Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.
h:
“Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.” —
Henry David Thoreau

q: Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
h:
“Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.” —
Robin Sharma

q: Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.
h:
“Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.” —
Kahlil Gibran

q: Few things are more deceptive than memories.
h:
“Few things are more deceptive than memories.” —
Carlos Ruiz Zafon

q: The greater the impact you want to make, the greater your influence needs to be.
h:
“The greater the impact you want to make, the greater your influence needs to be.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: He who leaves the game wins it.
h:
“He who leaves the game wins it.” —
Nicolas Chamfort

q: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions.
h:
“Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions.” —
Mark Twain

q: Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.
h:
“Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.” —
Simon Sinek

q: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
h:
“Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.” —
Laurence J. Peter

q: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.
h:
“Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.” —
Alan Watts

q: If you can't, you must. If you must, you can.
h:
“If you can't, you must. If you must, you can.” —
Tony Robbins

q: They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.
h:
“They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.” —
James Allen

q: The single most powerful asset we all have is our mind.
h:
“The single most powerful asset we all have is our mind.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

q: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
h:
“We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.” —
Ronald Reagan

q: Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.
h:
“Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.” —
Unknown

q: It ain't where you start in life, it's where you end up, and what you did along the way.
h:
“It ain't where you start in life, it's where you end up, and what you did along the way.” —
Colin Powell

q: Youth ages, immaturity is outgrown, ignorance can be educated, and drunkenness sobered, but stupid lasts forever.
h:
“Youth ages, immaturity is outgrown, ignorance can be educated, and drunkenness sobered, but stupid lasts forever.” —
Aristophanes

q: Everything has its beauty, but not everyone sees it.
h:
“Everything has its beauty, but not everyone sees it. ” —
Confucius

q: The world only exists in your eyes. You can make it as big or as small as you want.
h:
“The world only exists in your eyes. You can make it as big or as small as you want.” —
F. Scott Fitzgerald

q: If you do the work you get rewarded. There are no shortcuts in life.
h:
“If you do the work you get rewarded. There are no shortcuts in life.” —
Michael Jordan

q: Don't want anything. Then you get everything.
h:
“Don't want anything. Then you get everything.” —
Seungsahn

q: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
h:
“Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness but it is greatness.
h:
“Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness but it is greatness.” —
George Bernard Shaw

q: Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be.
h:
“Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

q: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
h:
“Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.” —
Babe Ruth

q: The best way to understanding is a few good examples.
h:
“The best way to understanding is a few good examples.” —
Isaac Newton

q: Make each day a new horizon.
h:
“Make each day a new horizon.” —
Christopher McCandless

q: Before enlightenment; chop wood, carry water. After enlightenment; chop wood, carry water.
h:
“Before enlightenment; chop wood, carry water. After enlightenment; chop wood, carry water.” —
Buddha

q: Every one of us is the sum total of his own thoughts.
h:
“Every one of us is the sum total of his own thoughts.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: Begin now to be what you will be hereafter.
h:
“Begin now to be what you will be hereafter.” —
St. Jerome

q: Constantly seek criticism. A well thought out critique of whatever you're doing is as valuable as gold.
h:
“Constantly seek criticism. A well thought out critique of whatever you're doing is as valuable as gold.” —
Elon Musk

q: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart.
h:
“Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
h:
“Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.” —
Mahatma Gandhi

q: When you judge others, you do not define them, you define yourself.
h:
“When you judge others, you do not define them, you define yourself.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: May you live all the days of your life.
h:
“May you live all the days of your life.” —
Jonathan Swift

q: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
h:
“Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
h:
“The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate. ” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: The more people you help become successful the more successful you become.
h:
“The more people you help become successful the more successful you become.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Reversing your treatment of the man you have wronged is better than asking his forgiveness.
h:
“Reversing your treatment of the man you have wronged is better than asking his forgiveness.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.
h:
“Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.” —
Epictetus

q: If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it's a distraction. Keep looking.
h:
“If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it's a distraction. Keep looking.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.
h:
“FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.” —
Zig Ziglar

q: To become what you are not, behave as you do not.
h:
“To become what you are not, behave as you do not.” —
T.S. Eliot

q: All religions, arts and sciences are branches of the same tree.
h:
“All religions, arts and sciences are branches of the same tree. ” —
Albert Einstein
